description: The SPEAKS- faculty/staff dataset contains individual level information from a sample of faculty and staff on GLS funded campuses. These data include faculty experiences with suicide prevention, training and making referrals, knowledge of suicide, suicide risk factors and available resources and the impact of suicide prevention programs among those who work on funded campuses.

distribution.title: Suicide Prevention Exposure, Awareness, and Knowledge Survey (SPEAKS) - Faculty/Staff

publisher.name: Substance Abuse & Mental Health Services Administration

title: Suicide Prevention Exposure, Awareness, and Knowledge Survey (SPEAKS) - Faculty/Staff
